articles.description: On Saturday Alex Lyon won his ninth straight game which tied a Buffalo Sabres record held for almost 50 years. Gerry Desjardins did it in 1976-77. Lyon did it in style posting a 26 save shutout in a 5-0 victory over the New York Islanders.
